biotools.summary: User-friendly management of gene expression data, which are assorted into experimental metadata, experimental design, raw data, normalized details, and analysis results. The web server functions as a collective and collaborative platform, by connecting each experiment with similar related experiments made public by other users, and correlating diverse gene expression levels under multiple experimental designs within different experiments.
